snippet.title: Hyper Light Breaker | World Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Hyper Light Breaker is a new 3D co-op adventure set in the beloved Hyper Light universe - launching Steam Early Access soon! Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/15...

Hyper Light Breaker is a new adventure set in the beloved Hyper Light universe – launching in Steam Early Access. For the very first time, players will be able explore the world of Hyper Light in 3D via single-player or online cooperative multiplayer. The game is currently in development from the same award-winning studio that created the critically-acclaimed Hyper Light Drifter, with the original creative director, Alx Preston, leading the charge.

Like: https://www.facebook.com/HyperLightBr...
Follow: https://twitter.com/HLBreaker
Watch: https://www.twitch.tv/HyperLightBreaker
